solution_line_template: The price per kilogram of potatoes is ${cost_for_2kg} / {quantity_for_cost} = $<<{cost_for_2kg}/{quantity_for_cost}={price_per_kg}>>{price_per_kg}.
To buy {total_kg_to_buy} kg of potatoes, she will have to pay {total_kg_to_buy} * ${price_per_kg} = $<<{total_kg_to_buy}*{price_per_kg}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}.
